Title: Introduction to the geography and geomorphology of the Andaman-Nicobar Islands
Abstract: © 2017 The Author(s). Published by The Geological Society of London.The geography and the geomorphology of the Andaman-Nicobar accretionary ridge (islands) is extremely varied, recording a complex interaction between tectonics, climate, eustacy and surface uplift and weathering processes. This chapter outlines the principal geographical features of this diverse group of islands.
